  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    CalendarService
    Title: Description: Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015 Company: NewTouch
    CodeListService
    Title: 通用编码定义列表Service Description: 通用编码列表 Copyright: Copyright (c) 2013 Company: Newtouch
    CodeService
    Title: 通用代码接口定义 Description: 通用代码接口定义 主要面向外部提供通用服务
    如返回Map,List Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015 Company: Newtouch
    CodeTypeService
    Title: 通用编码类型Service Description: 通用编码类型Service Copyright: Copyright (c) 2013 Company: Newtouch
    DemoService
    Title: Description: Copyright: Copyright (c) 2013 Company: Newtouch
    DepartmentService
    Title:部门管理Service类 Description: 用于处理部门信息查询、更新、新增 Copyright: Copyright (c) 2012 Company: Newtouch
    ExtendDepartmentService
    Title: 扩展DepartmentService Description: 扩展DepartmentService,支持ZTree树型结构 Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015 Company: Newtouch
    GroupService
    Title: 用户组 Description: 用户组 Copyright: Copyright (c) 2013 Company: Newtouch
    IconService
    Title: 图标icon的Service层 Description: 图标icon的Service层 Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015 Company: NewTouch
    LoginLogService
    Title: 用户登录日志 Description: 用户登录日志 Copyright: Copyright (c) 2013 Company: Newtouch
    ParameterService
    Title:系统参数定义Service接口 Description:用于保存系统参数设置 Copyright: Copyright (c) 2012 Company: Newtouch
    PasswordEncoderService
    Title: 密码加密码类 Description: 密码加密码类 包括加密方法、验证密码方法 Copyright: Copyright (c) 2014 Company: Newtouch
    PositionService
    Title:岗位信息Service层接口定义 Description:岗位信息编写 Copyright: Copyright (c) 2014 Company: Newtouch
    ReminderBodyService
    Title: Description: Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015 Company: NewTouch
    ResourceService
    Title: TsResourceService Description: TsResourceService 资源管理类 Copyright: Copyright (c) 2012 Company: Newtouch

    Title: 用户角色Service Description: 用户角色Service Copyright: Copyright (c) 2013 Company: Newtouch
    TasksService
    title :任务的services
    TipTextService
    Title: 提示信息日志 Description: 提示信息日志 Copyright: Copyright (c) 2013 Company: Newtouch
    TreeResourceService
    Title: 资源树结构Service定义扩展 Description: 资源树结构Service定义扩展 Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015 Company: Newtouch
    UserService
    Title: 用户管理Service接口 Description: 用于处理用户登录验证、新增、查询、保存 Copyright: Copyright (c) 2012 Company: Newtouch
